obscure_book.module_about.name: Obscuria Collection
obscure_book.module_about.content: Obscuria Collection - a series>of mods united by a common>setting and game mechanics.> >The main purpose of the>Collection is to add many hours>of gameplay that will provide>you with an unprecedented and>completely unique gaming>experience.
obscure_book.module_about.mod_list: You can find the full list>of supported mods on our>Discord server!
obscure_book.module_about.discord: Discord> Join our growing community to> stay up to date with the latest> news and vote on mod content.> In forum channels, you can ask> questions, suggest ideas, or> report bugs.
obscure_book.module_about.curseforge: CurseForge> Official author page on> CurseForge containing all> released mods.
obscure_book.module_about.patreon: Patreon> Please support me so that i can> spend more time modding and> bring you more content! ^^
obscure_book.module_about.github: GitHub> Official author page on> GitHub containing mods> source code.
obscure_book.module_about.planet: Planet Minecraft> Official author page> on Planet Minecraft.
obscure_book.module_attributes.name: Attributes
obscure_book.module_attributes.content: As you explore the world,>you can find items that>represent these attributes.>On this page you can>learn more about them.
obscure_book.module_attributes.accuracy: §cAccuracy §8Attack>§7 Increases the accuracy percentage>§7 of your attacks (your opponent>§7 will have a reduced chance>§7 to dodge and parry.>§8 Max Value: 100%
obscure_book.module_attributes.critical_: §cCritical Damage §8Attack>§7 Increases damage dealt by>§7 critical hits (200% by default).
§cCritical Hit §8Attack>§7 Increases the percentage of>§7 critical hit (critical hit deals>§7 increases damage).>§8 Max Value: 100%
obscure_book.module_attributes.dodge: §cDodge §8Protection>§7 Increases the chance to dodge an>§7 attack (damage will be ignored).>§8 Max Value: 80%
obscure_book.module_attributes.healing_p: §cHealing Power §8State>§7 Increases the effectiveness of>§7 all healing effects received.
obscure_book.module_attributes.magic_dam: §cMagic Damage §8Attack>§7 Additional damage dealt by an>§7 attack. Ignores armor and>§7 doesn't increase from>§7 critical damage.
obscure_book.module_attributes.magic_res: §cMagic Resistance §8Protection>§7 Reduces incoming magic damage>§7 (also damage from potions).>§8 Max Value: 80%
obscure_book.module_attributes.parry: §cParry §8Protection>§7 Increases the chance to parry an>§7 attack (damage will be redirected>§7 back to the attacker).>§8 Max Value: 80%
obscure_book.module_attributes.penetrati: §cPenetration §8Attack>§7 Reduces the effectiveness of>§7 the opponent's armor (physical>§7 attacks will ignore a certain>§7 percentage of armor).>§8 Max Value: 100%
obscure_book.module_attributes.regenerat: §cRegeneration §8State>§7 The amount of health>§7 regenerated every 30 seconds.
obscure_book.module_attributes.resilienc: §cResilience §8Protection>§7 Reduces the effectiveness of>§7 the opponent's critical attacks>§7 (reduces the chance and>§7 damage of critical attacks).>§8 Max Value: 50%
obscure_book.obscure_api.description: This is the heart of all> Obscuria Collection mods.> This mod provides the> following features:>§8 - Game Classes>§8 - New Attributes>§8 - AI Goals>§8 - Extended Tooltips>§8 - Animation Library>§8 - Utilities
rarity.legendary.name: Legendary
rarity.mythic.name: Mythic
tooltip.lore.obscure_book: Shining book containing>useful information related>to the Obscuria Collection.
effect.obscure_api.fury.description: Each level increase the power of class abilities by 10%.
effect.obscure_api.knowledge.description: Displays hidden information about some items in their tooltips.
effect.obscure_api.rush.description: Each level reduces the cooldown of class abilities by 10%.
enchantment.obscure_api.distance.descrip: Increase the radius of the chakras' orbit.
enchantment.obscure_api.fast_spin.descri: Increase the flight speed of chakras.
enchantment.obscure_api.mirror.descripti: Duplicates chakras, but each duplicate will only deal 50% damage.
